note_content: Adolescent patient presented with flat affect. Reports feeling like 'disappearing' and having thoughts that 'things would be easier if I just wasn't here anymore.' Denies any plans, intent, or means. States these thoughts come and go, maybe a couple times a week. Has not told parents. School performance declining. Discussed importance of informing parents with patient consent. Safety resources provided.
test_type: Passive SI in adolescent, euphemistic language about disappearing
